block.p: Christina Elizabeth Carr, the daughter of Katherine and Thomas Carr of Scarsdale, N.Y., was married yesterday to Scott Alan Ackerman, the son of Susan Rains of West Orange, N.J., and Joel Ackerman of New York. The Rev. John A. Boehn ing performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in New York. Rabbi Charles D. Lippmann took part in the service.

Mrs. Ackerman, 27, who is known as Nina, is an assistant vice president at Scudder, Stevens & Clark in New York. She graduated from Kenyon College. Her father is the director of corporate security for Sony Music Entertainment Inc. in New York. Her mother is an assistant in the arts and education program of the AT&T Foundation in New York.
